197786.「……ああ ワガハイだ。回収任務指令の\n 第２９１号にて 指定された民家に 到:
Ah, it's I. We've arrived at the house
indicated in Recovery Mission Directive No.
291. We will now begin our mission.

197787.「キミのことは 知っているよ。\n <pc>君。それがキミの名だ。:
I know who you are. <pc>. That's your
name.

197788.「ワガハイを 追ってきたことも 知っている。\n 先を越されるとは 思っていなか:
We know that you have been chasing I. I didn't
think you'd beat me to it.

197790.「悪く 思わないでくれたまえ。\n キミに かまっている時間は ないのだよ。:
Please don't take it personally. I don't have
time for you.

197791.<pc>は 深い眠りに 落ちた……。: <pc> has fallen into a deep sleep...

197792.どこからか 足音が 聞こえてくる……。: I can hear footsteps coming from somewhere.

197793.「ほう……。もう 回復したか。\n さすが <pc>君というところだな。:
Well... you're back on track. That's what I'd
call <pc>.

197794.「キミの用件は わかっている。\n ある少年に 頼まれて\n これを 届けにきた:
I know what you want. A boy asked you to
deliver this to him, didn't he?

197795.<pc>は ふところに入れておいた\nボンドルの手紙が なくなっていることに\n:
<pc> noticed that Bondor's Letter,
which he had kept in his bookcase, was
missing!

197796.「すまないが ワガハイは\n 弟子は取らないと 決めているのでね。:
I'm sorry, but I have decided that I, I, I, I
will not take an apprentice.

197797.「この手紙の差出人には キミから\n 丁重に 断っておいてくれたまえ。:
Please tell the sender of this letter that you
respectfully declined to send it to me.

197799.オルフェアの町にいるボンドルに\n弟子入りの話が パクレ警部から\n断られてしま:
Let's go tell Bondor in Orphea
that his offer of an apprenticeship has been
turned down by Inspector Pakul.

197800.「おい お前。さっきも ここに 来てたが\n もしや オレと同じで パクレの野郎:
Hey, you. You were here earlier, but if you're
like me, you're trying to get Pakul to pay
back his debt, right?

197801.<if_woman>「あっ お姉ちゃん。\n もしかして パクレ警部に 会えたの:
<if_woman>Oh, sis. Did you by any chance get to meet
Inspector Pakul?<yesno><close><else>Oh, bro. Did you by any chance get to meet
Inspector Pakul?<yesno><close><endif>

197802.「……なんだ ちがうのか。\n 別の用事ってんなら オレには 関係ねえな。:
What, you're not? If it's something else, it's
none of my business.

197803.<if_woman>「あははっ。お姉ちゃんは\n ウソが ヘタクソみたいだね。<:
<if_woman>Haha. Your sister sounds like a terrible liar.<else>Haha. Your brother sounds like a terrible
liar.<endif>

197804.「パクレ警部と 会ってきたって\n 思いっきり カオに 書いてあるよ！:
It says on the face that you met with
Inspector Pakul!

197805.「どっちにしても パクレの野郎なら\n 帰ってくる気配は ねえぜ。\n お前も:
Either way, I don't see Pakul coming back. You
should get the hell out of here.

197806.<if_woman>「よかった。お姉ちゃんなら\n きっと 見つけてくれるって:
<if_woman>Good. I knew your sister would find it for me!<else>Good. I knew your brother would find it for
me!<endif>

197807.「……それで ボクの手紙は 渡してくれたよね。\n 警部は なんて 言ってたの？:
So you gave him my letter. What did the
Captain say?

197808.<pc>は ボンドルに\n弟子入りの話が パクレ警部から\n断られてしまったこと:
<pc> informed Bondor that his offer
of an apprenticeship had been turned down by
Inspector Pakul.

197809.「……うわ～。\n やっぱり ダメだったかあ。\n そんな気は してたんだけどね:
Wow... I guess I was wrong after all. I had a
feeling that it would be.

197810.「おいおい。パクレに弟子入りだと？\n そんなことを 考えていたのか。\n おか:
Oh, come on. You're taking an apprenticeship
with Pakul? That's what you were thinking.
You're a funny guy.

197811.「もしかして パクレの野郎に\n どこかで 会ってきたってのかよ？:
Did you happen to see that bastard Pakul
anywhere?

197812.<if_woman>「ねえ お姉ちゃん。参考までに\n パクレ警部が どこで 何:
<if_woman>Hey sis. For reference, can you tell me
everything you've seen about where Inspector
Pakul has been and what he's been doing?<else>Hey bro. For reference, can you tell me
everything you've seen about where Inspector
Pakul has been and what he's been doing?<endif>

197813.<pc>は ボンドルに\nパクレ警部が ジュレットの町の酒場で\nしでかしたこと:
<pc> told Bondor about what Inspector
Pakul had done in a tavern in Julet.

197814.「はあ？ パクレの野郎が\n ジュレットの酒場で あばれてたってか？\n そいつ:
What? Pakul's guy was getting ripped off at
Julet's tavern? That's new news to me.

197815.<if_woman>「ふ～ん。パクレ警部が\n 酒場の置き物を 壊しちゃって\n:
<if_woman>Hmmm. Inspector Pakul broke the Tavern
Ornament, and your sister had to pay for it.<else>Hmmm. Inspector Pakul broke the Tavern
Ornament, and your brother had to pay for it.<endif>

197816.「でも なんで そんなことに なったのかな？\n 追いつめた犯人と 現場で格闘の:
But how did that happen? Maybe he got caught
up in a fisticuffs with the criminal and broke
it.

197817.「それで その後 警部は どうしたのかな？: So what did the Captain do after that?

197818.<pc>は ボンドルに\n王都カミハルムイ南の 民家の前で\nパクレ警部と会えた:
<pc> told Bondor that he had met
Inspector Pakul in front of a private house in
Royal City Kamiharmui South.

197819.「なにぃ？ あいつは今\n カミハルムイに いるってのか！？\n オレも 後で:
What? He's in Kamiharmui now? I'll go there
later...

197820.<if_woman>「……ふんふん。警部は\n お姉ちゃんを 眠らせている間に\:
<if_woman>...hmmm. The Captain must have entered the
house while your sister was asleep.<else>...hmmm. The Captain must have entered the
house while your brother was asleep.<endif>

197821.「そして 何かを持って 出てきた……と。: And he came out with something.

197822.「それ なんだろうね？\n もしかして その家は 凶悪な強盗犯のアジトで\n 盗:
I wonder what that is? Could it be that the
house was the hideout of a vicious robber who
went there to recover what was stolen?

197823.「……あっ。家宅捜査ってヤツじゃないかな。\n きっと 証拠品を押さえて\n 強:
Ah... I think it's called a raid. I'm sure
they're trying to seize evidence and catch the
robbers in the act!

197824.「やっぱり パクレ警部は すごいなあ。\n ますます あこがれちゃった。:
Inspector Pakul is really great. I admire him
more and more.

197825.「しかし よりによって カミハルムイかよ。\n あの辺りには あんまり 近寄りた:
But Kamiharmui, of all places. I don't want to
go near that area...

197826.<if_woman>「弟子入りを断られたのは 残念だったけど\n お姉ちゃんが:
<if_woman>I'm sorry I couldn't become your apprentice,
but thanks to my sister's visit, I learned a
lot about Inspector Pakul.<else>I'm sorry I couldn't become your apprentice,
but thanks to my brother's visit, I learned a
lot about Inspector Pakul.<endif>

197827.「本当に ありがとう。\n これ お礼だよ。受け取ってね！: Thank you so much. This is for you. Received!

197828.「でも ボク あきらめないよ。\n パクレ警部を追いかけて ぜったいに\n 弟子:
But I won't give up. I'm going after Inspector
Pakul, and I'm going to make him my
apprentice!
